title: Apartment Style Living- No Lease Required
posting_body: ['Sonesta ES Suites Memphis has everything you need without the hassles of traditional apartments, all at a great rate.', 'Each room comes with a fully equipped kitchen and plenty of workspaces.', 'And unlike apartments, cable and Wi-Fi are already hooked up and free!', '$1,800/month by mentioning this ad.', 'NO leases and NO credit checks, we are move-in ready.', 'So just bring yourself and family members – and feel right at home.', 'We also have great daily rates as well.', 'Stop in for a tour or call for details!', 'show contact info', 'Property Amenities Include:', 'Friendly and Welcoming Staff', 'All Rooms Non-Smoking', 'Pet-Friendly Rooms Available (fees apply)', 'Weekly Housekeeping Available', 'On-Site Guest Laundry', 'Free Gated Parking', 'Gym', 'In-Room Amenities', 'Fully Equipped Kitchens', 'Full-Size Refrigerator', 'Stove', 'Microwave', 'Free In-Room Wi-Fi', 'Flat Screen TVs', 'Free Cable']
